018package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.System.getProperty;
021import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isPublic;
022import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isStatic;
023import static javax.script.ScriptContext.ENGINE_SCOPE;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_String_ARRAY;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_CLASSPATH;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
031
032import javax.script.Compilable;
033import javax.script.CompiledScript;
034import javax.script.ScriptContext;
035import javax.script.ScriptEngine;
036import javax.script.ScriptEngineFactory;
037import javax.script.ScriptException;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.io.Reader;
040import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
041import java.lang.reflect.Method;
042
043import org.apiguardian.api.API;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.factory.JavaEngineFactory;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.java.JavaCompiledScript;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.java.JavaEngine;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.spi.ScriptEngineBase;
049
050/**
051 *  This is the script engine for the Java programming language.
052 *
053 *  @author A. Sundararajan
054 *  @modified    Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
055 *  @version $Id: JavaEngineImpl.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $
056 *  @since 0.0.5
057 *
058 *  @UMLGraph.link
059 */
060@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaEngineImpl.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $" )
061@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
062public final class JavaEngineImpl extends ScriptEngineBase implements JavaEngine
063{
064        /*---------------*\
065    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
066        \*---------------*/
067    /**
068     *  An implementation of
069     *  {@link CompiledScript}
070     *  for the Java engine.
071     *
072     *  @author A. Sundararajan
073     *  @modified    Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
074     *  @version $Id: JavaEngineImpl.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $
075     *  @since 0.0.5
076     *
077     *  @UMLGraph.link
078     */
079    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaEngineImpl.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $" )
080    public final class JavaCompiledScriptImpl extends JavaCompiledScript
081    {
082            /*--------------*\
083        ====** Constructors **=================================================
084            \*--------------*/
085        /**
086         *  Creates a new {@code JavaCompiledScriptImpl} instance.
087         *
088         *  @param  scriptClass The class that is represented by this compiled
089         *      script.
090         */
091        public JavaCompiledScriptImpl( final Class<?> scriptClass )
092        {
093            super( requireNonNullArgument( scriptClass, "scriptClass" ) );
094        }   //  JavaCompiledScriptImpl()
095
096            /*---------*\
097        ====** Methods **======================================================
098            \*---------*/
099        /**
100         *  {@inheritDoc}
101         *
102         *  @see CompiledScript#eval(ScriptContext)
103         */
104        @Override
105        public Object eval( final ScriptContext scriptContext ) throws ScriptException
106        {
107            final var retValue = evalClass( getScriptClass(), requireNonNullArgument( scriptContext, "scriptContext" ) );
108
109            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
110            return retValue;
111        }   //  eval()
112
113        /**
114         *  {@inheritDoc}
115         *
116         *  @see CompiledScript#getEngine()
117         */
118        @Override
119        public ScriptEngine getEngine() { return JavaEngineImpl.this; }
120    }
121    //  class JavaCompileScriptImpl
122
123        /*------------*\
124    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
125        \*------------*/
126    /**
127     *  The Java compiler that is used by this engine.
128     */
129    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
130    private final JavaCompiler m_Compiler;
131
132        /*--------------*\
133    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
134        \*--------------*/
135    /**
136     *  Creates a new {@code JavaEngineImpl} instance.
137     *
138     *  @param factory  The reference to the script engine factory that was
139     *      used to create this engine.
140     */
141    public JavaEngineImpl( final ScriptEngineFactory factory )
142    {
143        setFactory( factory );
144        m_Compiler = new JavaCompiler();
145    }   //  JavaEngineImpl()
146
147    /**
148     *  Creates a new {@code JavaEngineImpl} instance.
149     */
150    public JavaEngineImpl()
151    {
152        this( null );
153    }   //  JavaEngineImpl()
154
155        /*---------*\
156    ====** Methods **==========================================================
157        \*---------*/
158    /**
159     *  {@inheritDoc}
160     *
161     *  @see Compilable#compile(Reader)
162     */
163    @Override
164    public final CompiledScript compile( final Reader reader ) throws ScriptException
165    {
166        final var retValue = compile( readToString( requireNonNull( reader, "reader" ) ) );
167
168        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
169        return retValue;
170    }   //  compile()
171
172    /**
173     *  {@inheritDoc}
174     *
175     *  @see Compilable#compile(String)
176     */
177    @Override
178    public final CompiledScript compile( final String script ) throws ScriptException
179    {
180        final var scriptClass = parse( requireNonNull( script, "script" ), context );
181        if( isNull( scriptClass ) )
182        {
183            throw new ScriptException( "A main class could not be determined for the provided script" );
184        }
185        final CompiledScript retValue = new JavaCompiledScriptImpl( scriptClass );
186
187        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
188        return retValue;
189    }   //  compile()
190
191    /**
192     *  {@inheritDoc}
193     *
194     *  @see ScriptEngine#eval(Reader, ScriptContext)
195     */
196    @Override
197    public final Object eval( final Reader reader, final ScriptContext scriptContext ) throws ScriptException
198    {
199        final var retValue = eval( readToString( requireNonNull( reader, "reader" ) ), requireNonNull( scriptContext, "scriptContext" ) );
200
201        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
202        return retValue;
203    }   //  eval()
204
205    /**
206     *  {@inheritDoc}
207     *
208     *  @see ScriptEngine#eval(String, ScriptContext)
209     */
210    @Override
211    public final Object eval( final String script, final ScriptContext scriptContext ) throws ScriptException
212    {
213        final var scriptClass = parse( requireNonNull( script, "script" ), requireNonNull( scriptContext, "scriptContext" ) );
214        final var retValue = evalClass( scriptClass, scriptContext );
215
216        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
217        return retValue;
218    }   //  eval()
219
220    /**
221     *  Executes the code defined in the Java class that makes up this script.
222     *
223     *  @param  scriptClass The script class; may be {@code null}.
224     *  @param  context The script context.
225     *  @return The script class; if the {@code scriptClass} is
226     *      {@code null}, the return value is {@code null}, too.
227     *  @throws ScriptException The script throws an exception.
228     */
229    private static final Object evalClass( final Class<?> scriptClass, final ScriptContext context ) throws ScriptException
230    {
231        //---* As required by JSR-223 *----------------------------------------
232        context.setAttribute( "context", requireNonNull( context, "context" ), ENGINE_SCOPE );
233
234        @SuppressWarnings( "UnnecessaryLocalVariable" )
235        final var retValue = scriptClass;
236        if( nonNull( retValue ) )
237        {
238            try
239            {
240                final var isPublicClass = isPublic( retValue.getModifiers() );
241
242                //---* Find the setScriptContext() method *--------------------
243                final var setContextMethod = findSetScriptContextMethod( retValue );
244
245                //---* Call setScriptContext() and pass current context *------
246                if( nonNull( setContextMethod ) )
247                {
248                    if( !isPublicClass )
249                    {
250                        //---* Try to relax access *---------------------------
251                        setContextMethod.setAccessible( true );
252                    }
253                    setContextMethod.invoke( null, context );
254                }
255
256                //---* Find the main() method *--------------------------------
257                final var mainMethod = findMainMethod( retValue );
258                if( nonNull( mainMethod ) )
259                {
260                    if( !isPublicClass )
261                    {
262                        //---* Try to relax access *---------------------------
263                        mainMethod.setAccessible( true );
264                    }
265
266                    //---* Get the command line arguments for main *-----------
267                    final var args = getArguments( context );
268
269                    //---* Call the main method *------------------------------
270                    mainMethod.invoke( null, new Object [] {args} );
271                }
272            }
273            catch( final IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e )
274            {
275                throw new ScriptException( e );
276            }
277        }
278
279        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
280        return retValue;
281    }   //  evalClass()
282
283    /**
284     *  Looks up the main class from the given list of classes. The main class
285     *  is that one that has a method {@code main(String[])}.
286     *
287     *  @param  classes The candidates.
288     *  @return The main class, or {@code null} if none could be found.
289     */
290    private static Class<?> findMainClass( final Iterable<Class<?>> classes )
291    {
292        Class<?> retValue = null;
293
294        //---* Find a public class with main() *-------------------------------
295        Method mainMethod;
296        SearchPublicLoop: for( final var clazz : requireNonNullArgument( classes, "classes" ) )
297        {
298            if( isPublic( clazz.getModifiers() ) )
299            {
300                mainMethod = findMainMethod( clazz );
301                if( nonNull( mainMethod ) )
302                {
303                    retValue = clazz;
304                    break SearchPublicLoop;
305                }
306            }
307        }   //  SearchPublicLoop:
308
309        if( nonNull( retValue ) )
310        {
311            //---* Find a package private class with main() *------------------
312            SearchPackageLoop: for( final var clazz : classes )
313            {
314                mainMethod = findMainMethod( clazz );
315                if( nonNull( mainMethod ) )
316                {
317                    retValue = clazz;
318                    break SearchPackageLoop;
319                }
320            }
321        }   //  SearchPackageLoop:
322
323        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
324        return retValue;
325    }   //  findMainClass()
326
327    /**
328     *  Looks up the method {@code main(String[])} from the script class.
329     *
330     *  @param  clazz   The class to search.
331     *  @return The {@code main()} method, or {@code null} if the class
332     *      does not contain such a method.
333     */
334    private static Method findMainMethod( final Class<?> clazz )
335    {
336        Method retValue = null;
337        try
338        {
339            final var method = requireNonNullArgument( clazz, "clazz" )
340                .getMethod( "main", String [].class );
341            final var modifiers = method.getModifiers();
342            if( isPublic( modifiers ) && isStatic( modifiers ) )
343            {
344                retValue = method;
345            }
346        }
347        catch( final NoSuchMethodException ignored ) { /* The exception will be ignored deliberately */ }
348
349        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
350        return retValue;
351    }   //  findMainMethod()
352
353    /**
354     *  Looks up the method {@code setScriptContext(ScriptContext)} from the
355     *  script call.
356     *
357     *  @param  clazz   The class to search.
358     *  @return The {@code setScriptContext()} method, or {@code null} if
359     *      the class does not contain such a method.
360     */
361    private static Method findSetScriptContextMethod( final Class<?> clazz )
362    {
363        Method retValue = null;
364        try
365        {
366            final var method = requireNonNullArgument( clazz, "clazz" )
367                .getMethod( "setScriptContext", ScriptContext.class );
368            final var modifiers = method.getModifiers();
369            if( isPublic( modifiers ) && isStatic( modifiers ) )
370            {
371                retValue = method;
372            }
373        }
374        catch( final NoSuchMethodException ignored ) { /* The exception will be ignored deliberately */ }
375
376        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
377        return retValue;
378    }   //  findSetScriptContextMethod()
379
380    /**
381     *  Retrieves the script arguments from the context.
382     *
383     *  @param  context The script context
384     *  @return The command line arguments; if no arguments were defined in the
385     *      context, an empty array will be returned.
386     */
387    private static String [] getArguments( final ScriptContext context )
388    {
389        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( ARGUMENTS );
390        var retValue = EMPTY_String_ARRAY;
391        if( scope != -1 )
392        {
393            final var obj = context.getAttribute( ARGUMENTS, scope );
394            if( obj instanceof final String [] args ) retValue = args;
395        }
396
397        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
398        return retValue;
399    }   //  getArguments()
400
401    /**
402     *  Retrieves the classpath. First the method will look into the provided
403     *  context, and, if no classpath is given there, it will look at the
404     *  system property with the name {@code com.sun.script.java.classpath}.
405     *
406     *  @param  context The script context.
407     *  @return The classpath, or {@code null} if no classpath could be
408     *      retrieved.
409     *
410     *  @see #CLASSPATH
411     *  @see #SYSPROP_PREFIX
412     */
413    private static String getClassPath( final ScriptContext context )
414    {
415        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( CLASSPATH );
416        String retValue;
417        if( scope != -1 )
418        {
419            retValue = context.getAttribute( CLASSPATH, scope ).toString();
420        }
421        else
422        {
423            //noinspection ConstantExpression
424            retValue = getProperty( SYSPROP_PREFIX + CLASSPATH );
425            if( isNull( retValue ) ) retValue = getProperty( PROPERTY_CLASSPATH );
426        }
427
428        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
429        return retValue;
430    }   //  getClassPath()
431
432    /**
433     *  {@inheritDoc}
434     *
435     *  @see ScriptEngine#getFactory()
436     */
437    @Override
438    public final synchronized ScriptEngineFactory getFactory()
439    {
440        var retValue = super.getFactory();
441        if( isNull( retValue ) )
442        {
443            retValue = new JavaEngineFactory();
444            setFactory( retValue );
445        }
446
447        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
448        return retValue;
449    }   //  getFactory()
450
451    /**
452     *  Retrieves the filename of the script from the context; if none is given
453     *  there, the method will return {@code $unnamed.java}.
454     *
455     *  @param  context The script context.
456     *  @return The filename of the script.
457     */
458    private static String getFileName( final ScriptContext context )
459    {
460        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( FILENAME );
461        var retValue = "$unnamed.java";
462        if( scope != -1 )
463        {
464            retValue = context.getAttribute( FILENAME, scope ).toString();
465        }
466
467        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
468        return retValue;
469    }   //  getFileName()
470
471    /**
472     *  Retrieves the name of the main class, either from the provided context
473     *  or from the system properties.
474     *
475     *  @param  context The script context.
476     *  @return The name of the main class, or {@code null} if it could
477     *      not be found.
478     *
479     *  @see #MAINCLASS
480     *  @see #SYSPROP_PREFIX
481     */
482    private static String getMainClassName( final ScriptContext context )
483    {
484        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( MAINCLASS );
485        @SuppressWarnings( {"ConditionalExpressionWithNegatedCondition", "ConstantExpression"} )
486        final var retValue = scope != -1
487            ? context.getAttribute( MAINCLASS, scope ).toString()
488            : getProperty( SYSPROP_PREFIX + MAINCLASS );
489
490        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
491        return retValue;
492    }   //  getMainClassName()
493
494    /**
495     *  Retrieves the parent
496     *  {@link ClassLoader}
497     *  from the provided context.
498     *
499     *  @param  context The script context.
500     *  @return The parent classloader for the script, or {@code null} if
501     *      none was defined in the context.
502     */
503    private static ClassLoader getParentLoader( final ScriptContext context )
504    {
505        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( PARENTLOADER );
506        ClassLoader retValue = null;
507        if( scope != -1 )
508        {
509            final var loader = context.getAttribute( PARENTLOADER, scope );
510            if( loader instanceof ClassLoader )
511            {
512                retValue = (ClassLoader) loader;
513            }
514        }
515
516        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
517        return retValue;
518    }   //  getParentLoader()
519
520    /**
521     *  Retrieves the sourcepath either from the context or from the system
522     *  properties.
523     *
524     *  @param  context The script context.
525     *  @return The sourcepath or {@code null} if none is defined.
526     *
527     *  @see #SOURCEPATH
528     *  @see #SYSPROP_PREFIX
529     */
530    private static String getSourcePath( final ScriptContext context )
531    {
532        final var scope = requireNonNull( context, "context" ).getAttributesScope( SOURCEPATH );
533        @SuppressWarnings( {"ConditionalExpressionWithNegatedCondition", "ConstantExpression"} )
534        final var retValue = scope != -1
535            ? context.getAttribute( SOURCEPATH, scope ).toString()
536            : getProperty( SYSPROP_PREFIX + SOURCEPATH );
537
538        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
539        return retValue;
540    }   //  getSourcePath()
541
542    /**
543     *  Parses and translates the provided script (a Java source in this case)
544     *  and returns the resulting class.
545     *
546     *  @param  script  The script source.
547     *  @param  scriptContext   The script context.
548     *  @return The class that is used to start the script, or
549     *      {@code null} if that could not be found.
550     *  @throws ScriptException The script could not be successfully parsed.
551     */
552    private Class<?> parse( final String script, final ScriptContext scriptContext ) throws ScriptException
553    {
554        final var fileName = getFileName( requireNonNull( scriptContext, "scriptContext" ) );
555        final var sourcePath = getSourcePath( scriptContext );
556        final var classPath = getClassPath( scriptContext );
557
558        final var classBytes = m_Compiler.compile( fileName, requireNonNull( script, "script" ), scriptContext.getErrorWriter(), sourcePath, classPath );
559
560        if( isNull( classBytes ) || classBytes.isEmpty() )
561        {
562            throw new ScriptException( "The compilation of '%1$s' has failed".formatted( fileName ) );
563        }
564
565        /*
566         * Create a ClassLoader to load classes from MemoryJavaFileManager.
567         */
568        Class<?> retValue;
569        try( final var loader = new MemoryClassLoader( classBytes, classPath, getParentLoader( scriptContext ) ) )
570        {
571            //---* Determine the main class *----------------------------------
572            final var mainClassName = getMainClassName( scriptContext );
573            if( nonNull( mainClassName ) )
574            {
575                retValue = loader.loadClass( mainClassName );
576                final var mainMethod = findMainMethod( retValue );
577                if( isNull( mainMethod ) )
578                {
579                    throw new ScriptException( "The class '%1$s' does not define the method 'main()'".formatted( mainClassName ) );
580                }
581            }
582            else
583            {
584                /*
585                 * No explicit main class was configured, so we have to load
586                 * all compiled classes and search for the main class.
587                 */
588                final var classes = loader.loadAll();
589
590                //---* Search for class with main method *---------------------
591                retValue = findMainClass( classes );
592                if( isNull( retValue ) )
593                {
594                    /*
595                     * If there is no class with main method, then return the
596                     * first class.
597                     */
598                    final var iterator = classes.iterator();
599                    if( iterator.hasNext() )
600                    {
601                        retValue = iterator.next();
602                    }
603                }
604            }
605        }
606        catch( final ClassNotFoundException | IOException e )
607        {
608            throw new ScriptException( e );
609        }
610
611        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
612        return retValue;
613    }   //  parse()
614}
615//  class JavaEngine
616
617/*
618 *  End of File
619 */
